Help.Category:
Use[H]Key opens the basic controls instructions window.

[Movement controls]
[W] : Forward
[S] : Back
[A] : Left
[D] : Right
[E] : Auto run
[Space] : Jump
[Mouse] : Change the view direction(Perspective).

[Switching war mode]
Use[Tab]Key to enter or exit war mode.

[Fight controls]
[Left mouse button] : Basic attack
[Right mouse button] : Special attack
[Number keys1~0] : shortcut bar keys
[~] : Switch shortcut bar page

[R] : Resurrection
[F] : Pick up items
[Alt] : Show item names

[Toggle Mouse Mode]
Use[Ctrl]to unlock the mouse cursor. It is not recommended to do this in battle.

[View controls]
By[Mouse Movement]Changes view angle.
Use[Mouse Wheel]to zoom in and out.

[Enter chat]
Use[Enter]Key
to open the chat window.

[Chat window commands]
[/s] [/1] [Ctrl+1] : General chat
[/p] [/2] [Ctrl+2] : Party chat
[/g] [/3] [Ctrl+3] : Guild chat
[/w] [/4] [Ctrl+4] : Whisper

[Reply Private Message]
Use[T]Key
to answer the last whisper.

[Expression]
Use[I]Key to open your inventory.

[Instances]
1. Leave the village to enter[Regions of the world].
2. [Regions of the world]Have more than one[Instance Portals]，move to a portal to enter an instance.
3. Each[Portal]has a Level restriction.
4. If you are in a Party，all party members have to be at the Instance Portal.

[Skills]
1. Use [K]Key to open the skills window.
2. Click the icon to use the skill or
drag and drop it to the shortcut bar.
3. Use[Number keys1~0] to activate skills in your shortcut bar.

[Windows]
[P] : Character window
[I] : Inventory
[K] : Skill window
[O] : Social window
[U] : Quest window
[M] : Map
[L] : Achievement window
[Q] : PvPCombat Information window
[H] : Basic controls instruction window
[ESC] : System Settings menu

[Adjust interface]
[ + ] : Zoom in the map
[ - ] : Zoom out the map
[ ] ] : Increase the mouse sensitivity
[ [ ] : Reduce the mouse sensitivity

[Voice message]
System menu[ESC]-Game Settings-Macro command

[F1] : Request treatment
[F2] : Attack
[F3] : Follow
[F4] : Retreat
[F5] : Stop
[F6] : Help
[F7] : Chat macro 1
[F8] : Chat macro 2
[F9] : Chat macro 3
[F10] : Chat macro 4

[Other shortcut keys]
[Print Screen] : Save Screenshot
[Scroll Lock] : Save Video

[Create team]
Use[O]Key to open the social menu.
Choose[Team]After the page
Click[Create Team] to create a team.You can also right click on the player and select invite to team in the pop-up window.

[Join a team]
Select social window[Team]Page to see currently existing teams. Select any team and click [Join Now]to join the team.

[Loot distribution]
The team leader
has at the bottom of the team window[Loot distribution rules]And[Random allocation rules]to change the distribution rules.

[Random allocation rules] : Can be set to'DLevel'~'SLevel'，If you receive an item of a higher grade than set, all team members will be able to roll a dice.
[Basic allocation rules] : Can choose'order'、'Class preference' or 'leader'.
However, changing the rules after an item has droppes, has no effect.

[Combat Tips]
[Rebound batter]
Monsters hitting a wall or barrier will continue to be attackable after bounce.

[Team batter]
Letting other players knock the monster can increase the number hits.

[Special attack]
Special attacks can be used with the mouse right button(Kick)Depending on the state of monster, it activates different attacks.
Try to use it near a monster lying on the ground.
